com.adobe.cq.screens.assignment

Interface AssignmentService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AssignmentResolver

    public interface AssignmentService
extends AssignmentResolver
    Manages the assignments in the repository.

      • findRootAssignmentsForEntity

        java.util.Iterator<Resource> findRootAssignmentsForEntity(Resource resource)
        Find the root assignments for the specified resource (i.e. the assignments under a display that directly or indirectly point to that resource)
        Parameters:
        resource - The referenced resource
        Returns:
        The root assignments that point to this resource

Resource resolve(ResourceResolver resolver,
                             Resource parent,
                             Resource assignment)
        Deprecated. 
        Resolves the channel or schedule resource in the context of the given parent resource.
        Parameters:
        resolver - The resource resolver
        parent - The parent in which to look for the assignment
        assignment - The assignment resource
        Returns:

     throws PersistenceException
